archimate:Device.name: Patient Engagement AIO Desktop (Interactive Kiosk) (PED) ??
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Patient education displays, feedback kiosks, self-check-in stations, outpatient waiting areas, community outreach programs.
Specifications:
• Processor type: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 • Memory capacity: 16 GB RAM • Storage options: 512 GB SSD • Graphics capability: Integrated graphics • Expansion slots and ports: USB-A (x2), USB-C (x1), Ethernet, HDMI output, audio jack • Form factor: Compact, interactive kiosk design, robust public-access build, 21–24 inches • Power supply rating: Integrated PSU, 90–120W energy-efficient • Cooling system: Passive or low-noise cooling • Operating system compatibility: Windows 11 Pro Kiosk Mode • Monitor specs: 24 inches, Full HD touchscreen (1920x1080), durable tempered glass, bright and clear viewing angles • Protective Equipment: Tempered glass protective screen, vandal-resistant casing, secure mounting • Included peripherals: Mouse and Keyboard
• Security Features:
o Privacy screen filter integrated or attached o Remote management and location tracking capability o TPM 2.0 security module for encryption of patient data
